name: King Clash Rescue
description:
CONTROLS:  WASD, ENTER, & SHIFT

Your true love has been taken by the evil King! It's up to you to rescue her.

Interact with the people around the town to get items to progress the story.
Make careful decisions during encounters to over come them.
Defeat the King and rescue your true love!

This game was made for Miz Jam 1 where all participants had to use the exact same art source.

All art was used from the following source:
https://kenney.nl/assets/bit-pack

All music and sound effects were created by me using SFXR and AbletonLive.

I hope everyone enjoys the game! I'm super happy I submitted on time. I had to crunch super hard due to not being able to work on the game much at all until the end of the jam. I tried very hard to make the game and music feel like it could all be from a legit Gameboy game. I think it turned out pretty well!
